ref: 10296 mr̥dvīkā f. ʻ vine, bunch of grapes ʼ Suśr. [J. Char- pentier's proposal (AO vii 191) of a hyper -- sanskritism for *madvīkā -- ← Ir. *madvī -- in Bal. mavīč ʻ raisins ʼ leaves Pa. Pk. -- u -- unexpl.]
Pa. muddikā -- f. ʻ bunch of grapes, vine, grape wine ʼ;
Pk. muddiā -- f. ʻ grape vine ʼ,
